channel.title: Half life 3 in a leaked steam list

item.title: Half life 3 in a leaked steam list
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
Good point, Crypt. I’ll go ahead and close this. When something official for Half-Life 3 comes out, we can discuss it then. Right now, it’s probably just someone trolling Steam Greenlight.

If you’d guys like to speculate on Half-Life 3, go ahead and create a thread devoted for that (or find one that may have already been created). Let’s not create new threads for these kinds of “release” rumors. Thanks!

Read full topic
item.source: Half life 3 in a leaked steam list

Can we maybe not have a new thread every time something stupid like this pops up?
In fact didn’t the last thread get closed because there was nothing of merit?

item.title: Half life 3 in a leaked steam list
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
“Half Life 3” not “Half-Life 3”. The hyphen is important because that’s how Valve formats the name of the games. Let’s not get ahead of ourselves, folks.

Read full topic
